name: teams_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cricbuzz_cricket.
Tool description: This API helps to query for live cricket scores, commentary, latest cricket news and editorials, schedules of upcoming matches, rankings, stats, records, etc
API description: Fetches a list of cricket teams based on the specified type from the Cricbuzz API.

type.description: The type of teams to list. Valid options are `international`, `league`, `domestic`, or `women`.
